mapper.select: select a.* from base_aclbutton a LEFT JOIN base_aclmodule b ON a.module_id=b.id where b.code=#{code} and a.code != 'add';
select * from base_aclbutton where module_id=#{modelId} and code=#{code}
select a.*,b.id as mid,b.cname as mcname,b.code as mcode from base_aclbutton a inner join base_aclmodule b on b.id=a.module_id where module_id=#{modelId}
select a.*,b.id as mid,b.code as mcode,b.cname as mcname from base_aclbutton a left join base_aclmodule b on b.id=a.module_id where a.id=#{id}
select count(0) from base_aclbutton a where (a.cname like concat('%',#{param},'%') or a.code like concat('%',#{param},'%') or a.id=#{param}) and a.status='Y'
mapper.update: update base_aclbutton set status = #{status} where id = #{id};
